column5: Hey Guys, went to bps today to do some shopping and finally have my bag already for spring 2008. Im pretty proud of it so ive thrown up some pics! I forgot i still have another tacklebox in the shed with a good amount of lures to. The pink one is my girlfriends she got it put together over the last month. Alright you caught me the pink one is mine and the red one is hers...j,k
Holly flurking shnits!  Here's to many hours well waisted..  cheers! HD
Your girlfriend must have a lot of shoes

You're ill prepared, I didn't see the first Sabiki Rig or Roostertail!  Except for those 2 items everything looks fantastic. Now get out there and get some teeth marks, fish slime, and dirt on that new stuff!!!
Looks great!!!  I have to admit I'm a bit jealous!
Got it. Got it. Need it. Got it. Need it. Need it.
holey moley.  u mean i might need all that stuff to catch a fish?  do i buy it at Loblaws next to the fresh fish section?

Seeing those pictures reminds me of years gone by with my brother. We would spend hours in the winter organizing and then re-organizing our tackle boxes. We would trade lures back and forth waiting for spring. Memory lane.
Looks good to me.  The only thing that tackle box is missing, is a couple packs of YUM tubes.
OK so the pink tackle box is your girlfriend's, but the red teddy bear is yours right? Sorry couldn't help myself.
Actually kicking frog....it was lol it was a valentines day gift from her and ive had it a few years so i just brought it to her house to leave there lol
I dont have yum tubes but i do have other tubes and assorted rubbers left them in the compartment. Thank you BPS for your spring sale!
